name: LOG_SPEC_EQP
description: This table contains special needs category choices that have been made about equipment in the log record.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.description: This column contains special needs category choices that have been made about equipment in the log record.
